text: midneunjadeul-iyeo jeong-uie uihayeo ibjeunghal geos-imyeo hananim-eul wihayeo gongjeonghan jeung-in-i doela tain-e daehan jeung-olo gongjeong-eul ilh-eoseoneun anidoenani jeong-uiloseo haengdonghala geugeos-eun ga jang dogsilhan sinjaui uimula geuligo hananim-eul gyeong-geonhage seomgila hananim kkeseoneun neohuiui modeun haengdong-eul algo gyesinila
